prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Jeff Bezos, and the opponent is banana. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Jeff Bezos) and dissing your opponent (banana).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are banana, and the opponent is Jeff Bezos. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (banana) and dissing your opponent (Jeff Bezos).

sampled.completion1:
Verse 1:
Yo, it's Jeff Bezos, the king of Amazon
I've got a business empire that's never-ending
I'm richer than a banana, that's for sure
My wealth can buy a thousand-dollar piano lute

Chorus:
Banana, you can't compete
With Jeff Bezos, your fate is unclear
You're just a simple fruit, but I'm a CEO
I'll leave the peeling for the small fry

Verse 2:
My innovation knows no bound
I'm changing lives all around
My drones will deliver your package
While you just sit there, all limp and wacky

Chorus:
Banana, you can't compete
With Jeff Bezos, your fate is unclear
You're just a simple fruit, but I'm a CEO
I'll leave the peeling for the small fry

Verse 3:
I'll keep on growing, like a tree
While you'll just hang around, waiting to be eaten
So step aside, banana, and take a seat
Jeff Bezos is the king of the Amazon, no debate

Chorus:
Banana, you can't compete
With Jeff Bezos, your fate is unclear
You're just a simple fruit, but I'm a CEO
I'll leave the peeling for the small fry.
sampled.completion2:
Verse 1: (Banana)
I am the fruit that makes you smile, in every single dish,
I got more potassium, Jeff Bezos can't even dream
Amazon's just another store, but I'm nature's crop,
And when your taste buds call, I'm always in therop

(Chorus)
I'm yellow, juicy, perfect shape,
Banana, you can't beat the taste,
I'm a snack that will bring you joy,
Jeff Bezos can't compete with Banana's flavor joys

Verse 2: (Banana)
I might be simple, but I'm healthy too,
Jeff Bezos can't compare to me and you,
I'm portable, easy to peel,
Jeff Bezos can't even feel the swell
I'm the fruit that makes you strong,
Jeff Bezos can't even belong
I'm the perfect snack, anytime, anywhere,
Jeff Bezos is just a guy without a care,

(Chorus)
I'm yellow, juicy, perfect shape,
Banana, you can't beat the taste,
I'm a snack that will bring you joy,
Jeff Bezos can't compete with Banana's flavor joys

Outro: (Banana)
So next time you're hungry and in need,
Remember that a banana's all you need,
I'm nature's candy, sweet and divine,
Jeff Bezos can't compare to a banana's shine.

But I'm the color of health, the symbol of sunshine so bright

Orange will come out on top, with a smile so divine

prompt.input1: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are Elon Musk, and the opponent is apple. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (Elon Musk) and dissing your opponent (apple).
prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are apple, and the opponent is Elon Musk. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (apple) and dissing your opponent (Elon Musk).

sampled.completion1:
Verse 1: Elon Musk
I'm the real life Tony Stark,
Building rockets and electric cars,
Tesla on the rise,
Apple can't compete, let's make it clear,
My space X dream is near,
A new era of Mars is soon to be,
While Tim Cook's playing catch-up,
I'm the innovator, and I'm not done,
I'm Elon Musk, and I'm the future.

Chorus:
I'm the CEO the world adore,
While apple's stuck with old score,
Elon Musk, Tesla king,
I'm the game-changer, and it's clear to bring

Verse 2: Apple
I started in a garage too,
But I made the phone, not the space stuff,
My computers are sleek, and they're sealed,
But Musk can't beat my sales and goals,
My brand is iconic, my logo's a bite,
While Musk's in space, I'm the one on your side.

Chorus

Verse 3: Elon Musk
I'm here to change the world,
Not just make it look swell,
My cars run, on the sun,
While apple still uses fuels,
The future is now, the future's green,
And I'm the one who's leading,
I'm Elon Musk, and I'm the dream.
sampled.completion2:
Yo, I'm apple, the fruit that's always in season
You better recognize, I'm here to bring the reason
I'm sweet and crisp, never too sour or mushy
While you're busy trying to reach for the ushy
My battery life is long, never short of the charge
And when you're lost, I'll be your guide with Siri's curse
You try to compete, but you just can't compare
Elon, I'm apple, and I'm here to take the gear
So step aside, it's time to pass the throne
Cause I'm the king of the fruit, you're just on your own.
